attributes.action: actively support hands-on learning as a valuable and credible choice in education, giving everyone the chance of success in life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want more people to realise that there's more than one way to success in modern Britain.  Academic qualifications are one way. But hands-on learning is equally valid. We want the Govt to support these options, help persuade kids, parents, employers and educators that this route is a way to maximise our national raw talent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
